name: local-web-server
description: A simple web-server for productive front-end development

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md -t jsdoc2md/api.hbs -p list lib/*.js > doc/api.md; echo
scripts.cover: istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/tape test/*.js && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf coverage; echo

author: Lloyd Brookes <75pound@gmail.com>
